General.Name: China Wuyi Co Ltd
General.Description: China Wuyi Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate investment and development, international engineering general contracting, and international trade businesses. It also constructs residential, industrial, and commercial office buildings, schools, hospitals, conference centers, airports, roads, bridges, and other large public infrastructure projects; and offers property services. China Wuyi Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
